### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    total_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
    net_profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE financial_reports SET total_income = 5000.00 WHERE report_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    total_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
    net_profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE financial_reports SET total_income = total_income * 1.1, total_expenses = total_expenses * 1.05 WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
  report_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  total_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_expenses DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);


CREATE TABLE incomes (
  income_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_id INT NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (income_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES financial_reports(report_id)
);


CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_id INT NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (expense_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES financial_reports(report_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE financial_reports SET total_income = 5000.00 WHERE report_id = 1;
